name: Slime Time (Alexander Doan)
description: A young apprentice wizard slime is on a journey across a night-time field to visit his mentor's house. His has just learned a new spell - a ball of light! He decides to use it on some of the more dangerous wildlife on the way. The theme, enLIGHTen has guided this game as the type of magic the slime apprentice uses is made of light. #KSUGameJam
